bullets.text: Reduced API latency by 40% through Redis caching implementation, resulting in improved user experience for 2M+ daily active users
Led migration of monolithic application to microservices architecture, improving deployment frequency by 300% and reducing incident resolution time by 60%
Built real-time data pipeline processing 1M+ events/day using Kafka and Spark, enabling predictive analytics features
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs serving 10K+ requests/second with 99.9% uptime SLA
Mentored team of 5 junior developers, establishing code review practices that reduced production bugs by 45%
Implemented comprehensive CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions and Terraform, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
